_sText:
Is_ctf_revolution

by ZaLoS

custom textures by Icecreamlock, ZaLoS

custom skybox texture by Karatekaefer

3d skybox by udel steve

Ctf prefab by ZaLoS


CTF:

You cant pick up your own flag, which is located behind spawn.

To score get the other teams flag and drop it at your flags base. You cannot score without your flag being at the base. Scoring kills the other team.



The map:
There are three routes, the middle is the fastest, but prolly the hardest to stay on. The south is easier than the middle and includes some wall obstacles and is meant for the newer is-ers. The northern route is an upper route that is the slowest but will take you directly to the opposites team flag.

There are two shotties, one at each teams base. They are intended for defensive use tho you could go offense with them. However, I Would recomend sticking one teammate on D tho.


Special thanks to www.solidsurf.info, www.fpsbanana.com, www.mapjunkies.com, and Icecreamlock for hosting the beta! 

Additional thanks to Apexi for the ctf+is idea :D




ice skate @ 217.163.25.22:27015

 

Note: This map is not intended for deathmatch servers. Ctf does not work in deathmatch, deathmatch destroys the weapons people have after they die instantly, which also destroys the flag logic. 

This map is compiled with hdr, if you dont like hdr, turn it off with mat_hrd_enabled 0 in console! have fun :D
